maqras.text: inne-llahe yudafi`u `ani-llezine amenu. inne-llahe la yuhibbu kulle havvanin kefur
uzine lillezine yukatelune biennehum zulimu. veinne-llahe `ala nasrihim lekadir

ellezine uhricu min diyarihim bigayri hakkin illa ey yekulu rabbune-llah. velevla def`u-llahi-nnase ba`dahum biba`dil lehuddimet savami`u vebiye`uv vesalevatuv vemesacidu yuzkeru fihe-smu-llahi kesira. veleyensuranne-llahu mey yensuruh. inne-llahe lekaviyyun `aziz
ellezine im mekkennahum fi-l'ardi ekamu-ssalate veatevu-zzekate veemeru bilma`rufi venehev `ani-lmunker. velillahi `akibetu-l'umur
veiy yukezzibuke fekad kezzebet kablehum kavmu nuhiv ve`aduv vesemud
vekavmu ibrahime vekavmu lut
veashabu medyen. vekuzzibe musa feemleytu lilkafirine summe ehaztuhum. fekeyfe kane nekir
fekeeyyim min karyetin ehleknaha vehiye zalimetun fehiye haviyetun `ala `urusiha vebi'rim mu`attaletiv vekasrim mesid
efelem yesiru fi-l'ardi fetekune lehum kulubuy ya`kilune biha ev azanuy yesme`une biha. feinneha la ta`me-l'ebsaru velakin ta`me-lkulubu-lleti fi-ssudur
veyesta`ciluneke bil`azabi veley yuhlife-llahu va`deh. veinne yevmen `inde rabbike keelfi senetim mimma te`uddun
vekeeyyim min karyetin emleytu leha vehiye zalimetun summe ehaztuha. veileyye-lmesir
kul ya eyyuhe-nnasu innema ene lekum nezirum mubin
fellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lehum magfiratuv verizkun kerim
vellezine se`av fi ayatina mu`acizine ulaike ashabu-lcehim
vema erselna min kablike mir rasuliv vela nebiyyin illa iza temenna elka-sseytanu fi umniyyetih. feyensehu-llahu ma yulki-sseytanu summe yuhkimu-llahu ayatih. vellahu `alimun hakim
liyec`ale ma yulki-sseytanu fitnetel lillezine fi kulubihim meraduv velkasiyeti kulubuhum. veinne-zzalimine lefi sikakim be`id
veliya`leme-llezine utu-l`ilme ennehu-lhakku mir rabbike feyu'minu bihi fetuhbita lehu kulubuhum. veinne-llahe lehadi-llezine amenu ila siratim mustekim
vela yezalu-llezine keferu fi miryetim minhu hatta te'tiyehumu-ssa`atu bagteten ev ye'tiyehum `azabu yevmin `akim
elmulku yevmeizil lillah. yahkumu beynehum. fellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati fi cennati-nne`im
vellezine keferu vekezzebu biayatina feulaike lehum `azabum muhin
vellezine haceru fi sebili-llahi summe kutilu ev matu leyerzukannehumu-llahu rizkan hasena. veinne-llahe lehuve hayru-rrazikin
leyudhilennehum mudhaley yerdavneh. veinne-llahe le`alimun halim
